Professional Economic Analysis Tools

Free, open-access calculators and tools for forensic economics, business valuation, and economic damage analysis. Used by attorneys, economists, and financial professionals.

Expert Tools for Legal Professionals

Our suite of professional tools provides quick, accurate calculations for common economic analysis needs in litigation support. All tools use current, peer-reviewed methodologies and data sources to ensure reliability for legal proceedings.

Life Expectancy Lookup Tool

Forensic Economics Personal Injury

Professional life expectancy calculator using CDC/NCHS data. Calculate total life expectancy, work-life expectancy, and years in the workforce for economic damage analysis.

  • Current CDC/NCHS mortality data
  • Age, gender, and race-specific calculations
  • Work-life expectancy (WLE) values
  • Years to final separation (YFS)
  • Printable reports for litigation
Access Tool →

Present Value Calculator

Economic Damages All Practice Areas

Calculate present value of future economic losses using appropriate discount rates. Essential for personal injury, wrongful death, and commercial damages.

  • Single and periodic payment calculations
  • Growing payment modeling
  • Multiple discount rate scenarios
  • Professional results display
  • Detailed calculation breakdowns
Access Tool →

Wage Growth Projector

Employment Lost Earnings

Project future earnings using historical wage data, inflation rates, and individual merit increases. Ideal for employment litigation and personal injury cases.

  • Industry-specific wage modeling
  • Merit and promotion calculations
  • Education level adjustments
  • Comprehensive fringe benefits
  • Career progression analysis
Access Tool →

Household Services Valuation

Personal Injury Wrongful Death

Calculate the economic value of household services for injury and wrongful death cases using time-use survey data and replacement cost methods.

  • BLS time-use survey data
  • Age and family-size adjustments
  • Regional wage rate integration
  • Employment status considerations
  • Professional valuation methods
Access Tool →

Quick Business Valuation

Business Valuation Commercial Disputes

Preliminary business valuation using income, market, and asset approaches. Useful for initial case assessment and settlement discussions.

  • Multiple valuation approaches
  • Industry-specific multipliers
  • DCF and market methods
  • Ownership interest calculations
  • Comprehensive results analysis
Access Tool →

Medical Cost Projector

Medical Malpractice Life Care Plans

Project future medical costs using medical-specific inflation rates and life care plan requirements for catastrophic injury cases.

  • Medical CPI inflation rates
  • Category-specific cost modeling
  • Present value calculations
  • Life expectancy integration
  • Professional results reporting
Access Tool →

Need Custom Economic Analysis?

While our tools provide quick calculations, complex cases often require detailed, customized analysis.
